text: 26:20 Matyu 3:8; Aposel 9:20; 9:28-29; 11:26; 13:14Egha kɨ faragha Damaskusɨn nguibamɨn akam akuni, egha Jerusalemɨn akam akunigha, Judan nguibaba bar dar akam akurava, uaghan Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba sara akam me mɨkɨra ghaze, ‘Ia uan navibagh iragh ua God bagh izɨ. Eghtɨ ian arazir ia amiba, ian gun mɨkɨm suam, ia navibagh iragha gɨfa.’
